name: Political subdivision of the State; applicability
text: The provisions contained in this chapter shall apply to all political subdivisions of the State.  Provided, however, in the event that any political subdivision of the State shall provide by charter, ordinance or otherwise, more stringent requirements relating to mandating the openness of meetings, the more stringent provisions of said charter, ordinance, or otherwise, shall apply. [L 1976, c 212, §5]
